task_intent.title: 052-replace-recharts-with-lightweight-chart-library
task_intent.description: Replace recharts (~500KB unparsed, ~150KB gzipped) with a lightweight charting library like visx (~40KB) or uPlot (~30KB) to reduce bundle size and improve dashboard performance. Used in PredictionWidget (analytics-dashboard) and MetricsChart (observability dashboard).
